lines.text: He's the dumbest human being I ever saw. Every time he opens his mouth he subtracts from the sum total of human knowledge.

[Straddling a barbed wire fence]
Ow ow ow ow! I've got this thing caught on one of my...

[Puts a white nightgown on Hicks]
Well, now you're a sure thing for the Ku Klux Klan vote!
Gentlemen, gentlemen! I've just thought of an outstanding idea!
Yes, Mr. Hicks, what is it?
I would like to come forth with a platform against capital punishment.
Mr. Hicks, capital punishment was abolished in this state six months ago.
Yeah, but I don't like it much.
But you have played strip poker? Now that is a game!
Strip poker? How do you play that?
It's just like regular poker. Only instead of the bets, the loser has to take off some garment. It's lots of fun!
Oh, I see. There's some sense to that.
